headline: Biden to push tougher rules on sale of ghost guns that would make manufacturers add serial number to all firearms and require background checks before selling kits
author: Matt McNulty
sentences: The Biden administration is set to release long-awaited rule changes for the sale of ghost guns under growing pressure to crack down on a nationwide spike in the use of the deadly weapons.The new rules, which could be unveiled as soon as Monday, are designed to get privately made firearms without serial numbers off the streets, three people familiar with the matter told The Associated Press.The stiffer measures would require firearms dealers to run background checks before they sell ghost gun kits that contain the necessary parts needed to assemble a firearm.

Fun fact, it is already illegal to make a gun without a serial number on the lower receiver, this new change will only make things more difficult for small scale manufacturers who make custom guns...instead of being able to buy partially completed lower receivers, finish them and put a serial number on them, they will have to buy them with a serial number already on them...meaning that the serial number will not tell the police much about the gun since it will be applied by a manufacturer who does not know what the completed gun will look like.

Gun grabbers just have their next target in mind and immediately go to their pre-determined talking points whenever a headline producing shooting occurs, never bothering to determine if their proposed new laws would have had any effect on the recent incident.

As I understand it, under existing rules there is only one part of a gun that is required to be stamped with a serial number, and every one of those that a manufacturer makes must be stamped with a serial number.
The "concern" is that anybody with a CNC mill and the skill to use it can make that part for themselves and buy all of the other parts, putting together a gun without a serial number.
